articles.title: ​White House extends student loan repayment freeze through August - Axios
articles.description: "This continued pause will help Americans breathe a little easier as we recover and rebuild from the pandemic."
articles.content:
President Biden on Wednesday extended the pause on federal student loan repayments through Aug. 31, 2022.

articles.title: Defence getting billions of dollars in new money from Thursday's budget: source - CBC.ca
articles.description: The federal budget is expected to pour up to $8 billion in new money into the Department of National Defence, CBC News has learned — an investment that will lean heavily on improving the military's ability to defend North America.

articles.title: U.S. sanctions Putin's daughters and more Russian banks - Reuters.com
articles.description: The United States targeted Russian banks and elites with a new round of sanctions on Wednesday, including banning Americans from investing in Russia, in response to what President Joe Biden condemned as "major war crimes" by Russian forces in Ukraine.

articles.title: Zoos hiding birds as avian flu spreads in North America - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Zoos across North America are moving their birds indoors and away from people and wildlife as they try to protect them from the highly contagious and potentially deadly avian influenza.
